text: puokke ban b nd tiet tha saum anak som pi mcheasa robsa anak aoy trong banhcheak brab puok yeung banthem tiet ampi lokkhan sa mb tde robsa meko noh proh meko noh thveu aoy puok yeung min chbasa . haey pitabrakd nasa bae a l laoh mean chetnea ku puok yeung nung ttuol ban kar changaoulobangheanh
